authentication.details:
Firebase authentication is implemented using Firebase SDK.
User login functionality using Firebase authentication.
User authentication is implemented using Firebase authentication in userSlice.js.
User signup form with fields for email, password, and confirm password.
User authentication is implemented using Firebase authentication for user signup.
User authentication is implemented using Firebase authentication for sign-in and sign-out functionality.

database.details: Firebase Firestore is used for database operations in noteSlice.js.

storage.details:
Firebase Firestore is used for storing notes data.
Data storage is implemented using Firebase Firestore in noteSlice.js.
